title: Happy birthday USMC
author: VD
content_html: A salute to the finest fighting force the world has ever known, and I pray that none of you will come to harm in the current fighting in Fallujah. Bring the noise and bring the battle to a speedy and victorious close.
content_text: A salute to the finest fighting force the world has ever known, and I pray that none of you will come to harm in the current fighting in Fallujah.  Bring the noise and bring the battle to a speedy and victorious close.
